
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53101487">
PS每年更新，功能越来越多越来越杂，导致有的文件明明一个图片，却有几百M甚至上G<br>
<br>
所以弄了一个脚本来<font color="#404040"><font face="DeepSeek-CJK-patch, Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16.002px">删除文档的Document Ancestors元数据，</font></font></font><font color="#404040"><font face="DeepSeek-CJK-patch, Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16.002px">去除冗余</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#404040"><font face="DeepSeek-CJK-patch, Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16.002px"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#404040"><font face="DeepSeek-CJK-patch, Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16.002px">使用方法：</font></font></font><font face="DeepSeek-CJK-patch, Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Noto Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, Oxygen, Open Sans, sans-serif"><font color="#404040"><font style="font-size:16.002px">把文件放到任意地方，记住位置，在PS里打开需要缩小的文件，选择：文件→脚本→浏览，选择下载的脚本文件，载入，然后存储文件。</font></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_OfDEt" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img.z4a.net/images/2025/05/23/s.jpeg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.z4a.net/images/2025/05/23/s.jpeg"><font face="DeepSeek-CJK-patch, Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Noto Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, Oxygen, Open Sans, sans-serif"><font color="#404040"><font style="font-size:16.002px"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="DeepSeek-CJK-patch, Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto, Noto Sans, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Helvetica Neue, Oxygen, Open Sans, sans-serif"><font color="#404040"><font style="font-size:16.002px">蓝奏云：https://wwpo.lanzoue.com/iSbcq2wxyt7i</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font color="#404040"><font face="DeepSeek-CJK-patch, Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16.002px"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#404040"><font face="DeepSeek-CJK-patch, Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot;"><font style="font-size:16.002px"><br>
